featured.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding GABA in zebrafish? (A) Increasing GABA level facilitates neuron activities.
They found that lowering GABA levels in zebrafish can trigger retina regeneration, while a high level of GABA concentration will suppress the regeneration process.
The team is beginning to test the GABA theory on mice.
This suggested that GABA plays an important role in the fish’s ability to regain their sight.

In order to know exactly how zebrafish retina is regenerated, the team looked at the neurotransmitter gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA), a chemical messenger in the brain that reduces the activity of neurons.

definition.zh_def: 一種氨基酸，作為神經遞質在中樞神經系統中起到抑制作用。
definition.en_def: A type of amino acid that acts as an inhibitory neurotransmitter in the central nervous system.
definition.example: GABA is often used as a supplement to help reduce anxiety.
